name: Submarine adventure: Ballast
description:
Take control of a exploratory submarine and conquer the depths of the sea. Submarine adventure is a free arcade game in the best tradition of hardcore games. A wonderful game for children and a game for adults, everyone will find in it something for themselves.

In the game you have to go through 16 exciting levels and two bosses, showing the ability to control a submarine.
You will be available to unlock 5 skins, which diversifies the passage of levels.
